entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Monday 26 December 2022
